mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.board_id AS "board.id", p.title AS "board.title", a.item AS "item", a.title AS "title", a.description AS "description", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
LEFT JOIN sys_user uu ON uu.id = a.update_by LEFT JOIN mod_board p ON p.id = a.board_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mod_board_item( id, board_id, item, title, description, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{board.id}, #{item}, #{title}, #{description}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE mod_board_item SET board_id = #{board.id}, item = #{item}, title = #{title}, description = #{description}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
